meanings.definition: An artificial body part, such as a limb or organ, that replaces a missing part.
meanings.sent1: She was able to walk again with the help of her prostheses.
meanings.sent2: The hospital provided him with prostheses after his accident.
meanings.sent3: The robot wanted to wear prostheses to fit in with the humans.
meanings.sent4: Her prostheses were like magical extensions of her body.
meanings.sent5: The prostheses gleamed in the sunlight, a symbol of hope and resilience.
